There are (or will be) two ways to enjoy *Bayes Rules! An introduction to Bayesian modeling with R*:

- Online and free at [bayesrulesbook.com](https://www.bayesrulesbook.com).

- In print from CRC Press. We hope for this to be available in early 2022.
